title: ‘Sound Ancestors’ by Madlib Review: Turning Bite-Size Samples Into a Full Meal
sub_head: The producer teams with Kieran Hebden, aka Four Tet, on an album that merges borrowed musical snippets into a satisfying whole.
body: When producers who make new music by sampling old music are especially prolific, their discographies can easily become overwhelming. Forget expensive studios and paying musicians: A large record collection and a simple recording setup are all they need when inspiration strikes.
